name: Mentoring Intro and Ice Breaker
description:
Mentor introduction and ice breaker template

  • For mentors to introduce their background to mentees
  • Add your details to share with your mentee
  • Record a quick video and share before your session to save time
  • Mentor and mentee can add details about themselves in the 'ice breaker' profile
  • It's a great way to learn more about the mentee as they share details
